auth.name: Name

partners.title: Our Partners
partners.subtitle: Working together to create lasting change

slide1.title: Empower Through Education
slide1.description: Join us in transforming lives through quality education. Every child deserves a chance to learn and grow.

slide2.title: Clean Water for All
slide2.description: Help us bring safe, clean water to communities in need. Together, we can make a lasting impact.

slide3.title: End Hunger Together
slide3.description: Your support can help feed families and build sustainable food solutions for communities in need.

causes.noCausesFound: No causes found matching your criteria.

cause.notFound: Cause not found. The cause you're looking for might have been removed or doesn't exist.

payment.selectMethodError: Please select a payment method to continue.

payment.paymentInitiationError: Unable to initiate payment. Please try again or select a different payment method.

payment.certificateErrorDescription: We couldn't generate your certificate, but your donation was processed successfully.

errors.missingPaymentUrl: Invalid payment response: Missing payment URL
